content:
A while ago I started writing a page of suggested readings on my website. They mostly focus on Logic and Category Theory. Maybe someone could be interested.

Here is the link.

I love this sentence:

we will call logic the culture that emerged in continuity with the so called crisis of foundations (of mathematics) at the end of the 19th century

Regardless of whether this is a good definition or not, I love the fact you define logic to be a culture. So true!
